xuiToolbar
directive in module xui

Description

XUI wrapper for toolbar control. It groups toolbar items (xui-toolbar-item), which can be aligned to the left or right side of the bar. Items are aligned to the left by default. Use xui-toolbar-splitter to determine the place, where the right alignment starts. Use xui-toolbar-divider to display a vertical line between items.

Usage

as element:
<xui-toolbar>
</xui-toolbar>
